intro: Psychotria elliptilimba, commonly known as the elliptical psychotria, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It often grows in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical rainforests. Psychotria elliptilimba is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical uses, though further research is needed to fully understand its properties.
